Fletcher Reede.action: Drives the mobile stairs unit alongside the moving plane, managing to keep pace and look for his family inside.

Fletcher Reede.action: Pins the toolbox to the accelerator to keep the stairs moving forward while climbing up the steps.

Fletcher Reede.action: Notices the stairs about to crash into the wing and quickly finds the control to lower the stairs, then maneuvers under the wing and raises the stairs on the other side.

Fletcher Reede.action: Screams to get the attention of Max, Audrey, and Jerry on the plane to warn them of danger.
